text: Naxalism is a type of Communism in India. It started in the 1960s from the village named naxalwadi in west bengal . they believed in armed struggle to establish communist govt. naxalism is motivated from the maoism ideology of china Naxalism is named after the town of Naxalbari in West Bengal. ==Related pages== *Naxaliteâ€“Maoist insurgency ==References== Category:1960s establishments Category:Communism Category:Politics of India
title: Naxalism
